pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multistage Allocation // Multivariate optimal allocation for different domains in one and two stages stratified sample design. R2BEAT extends the Neyman (1934) doi:10.2307/2342192 Tschuprow (1923) allocation method to the case of several variables, adopting a generalization of the Bethels proposal (1989). R2BEAT develops this methodology but, moreover, it allows to determine the sample allocation in the multivariate and multi-domains case of estimates for two-stage stratified samples.
